books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic novel that explores the themes of love, reputation, and class in early 19th century England.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A profound novel that addresses serious issues like racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A tragic love story set in the Roaring Twenties that critiques the American Dream.

books.title: Moby-Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: An epic tale of obsession and revenge between a sea captain and a giant white whale.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel that delves into themes of totalitarianism, surveillance, and individualism.
